```{r library, include=FALSE}
bq_auth()


### Set Box folders for output CSV files #######################################
use_test_box_folder <- FALSE # Local user sets this (Jake or Kelsey)

# TODO: Fix conditional box folder configuration.

# Over-ride if using plumber api on GCP (USER DOESN'T TOUCH THIS!)
# Check if the environment variable exists and is not empty

#}

if (use_test_box_folder) {
  boxfolder <- 222593912729 # test box folder
} else {
  boxfolder <- 221297686961 # destination of CSV files (not pdf)
}
################################################################################



project <- "nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04"


bio <- "WITH T AS (
  SELECT Connect_ID FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.biospecimen_JP`
  GROUP BY Connect_ID
  HAVING COUNT(Connect_ID) =1) 
SELECT * FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.biospecimen_JP`
INNER JOIN T ON `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.biospecimen_JP`.Connect_ID = T.Connect_ID ;"



parts <- "SELECT Connect_ID, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_139245758, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_156605577, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_184451682, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_185243482, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_198261154, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_210921343, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_224596428, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_316824786, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_341570479, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_398645039, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_448660695, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_452847912, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_453452655, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_530173840, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_534041351, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_541311218, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_561681068, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_592099155, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_693370086, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_718172863, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_728696253, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_740582332, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_769615780, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_786930107, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_822274939, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_847159717, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_860477844, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_880794013, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_915179629, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_939818935, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_982213346, d_684635302, d_254109640, d_878865966, d_167958071, d_827220437, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_543608829, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_110349197, d_831041022, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_379252329, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_221592017, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_319972665_d_661940160, d_195145666

parts_data <- bq_table_download(parts_table, bigint = "integer64", n_max = Inf, page_size = 1000)
```

### 1. (Derived) Clinical DB Blood RRL Received (BioClin_DBBloodRRL_v1r0): If all blood tubes are not collected, this should be no
```{r BioClin_DBBloodRRL_v1r0, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

qc2 <- bioqc %>%  filter( d_232343615_d_593843561==104430631 & d_299553921_d_593843561==104430631 & d_376960806_d_593843561==104430631 & d_454453939_d_593843561==104430631 & d_589588440_d_593843561==104430631 & d_958646668_d_593843561==104430631 & d_677469051_d_593843561==104430631 & d_683613884_d_593843561==104430631 & d_703954371_d_593843561==104430631 & d_838567176_d_593843561==104430631 & d_173836415_d_266600170_d_534041351!=104430631) 

qc2 <- qc2  %>% select(Site, Connect_ID, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_534041351)  %>%  sort_by(Site)


colnames(qc2) <- c("Site", "Connect ID", "Value")
knitr::kable(qc2)
```



### 2. If all blood tubes are not collected, (Derived) Clinical Site Blood Collected (BioClin_SiteBloodColl_v1r0) should be no or NULL.
```{r Clin_SiteBloodColl, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

qc2_1 <- bioqc %>%  filter( d_232343615_d_593843561==104430631 & d_299553921_d_593843561==104430631 & d_376960806_d_593843561==104430631 & d_454453939_d_593843561==104430631 & d_589588440_d_593843561==104430631 & d_958646668_d_593843561==104430631 & d_677469051_d_593843561==104430631 & d_683613884_d_593843561==104430631 & d_703954371_d_593843561==104430631 & d_838567176_d_593843561==104430631 & 
                              d_173836415_d_266600170_d_693370086==353358909 & 
                              Connect_ID!=2300063524) #specific exclusion- not editing this persons data
qc2_1 <- qc2_1  %>% select(Site, Connect_ID, d_173836415_d_266600170_d_693370086)  %>%  sort_by(Site)


colnames(qc2_1) <- c("Site", "Connect ID", "Value")
knitr::kable(qc2_1)


```

## 29. BioClin_DBBloodID_v1r0 must be in BioClin_PolyBloodID_v1r0


```{r BioClin_PolyBloodID_v1r0, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# 
# bioqc1 <- bioqc %>%  filter(!is.na(d_646899796_integer) & 
#                               if(Site %in% c("Baylor Scott and White Health","HealthPartners","Marshfield Clinical Health System",
#                                              "Kaiser Permanente Colorado","Kaiser Permanente Georgia","Kaiser Permanente Hawaii","Kaiser Permanente Northwest")){
#                                 d_173836415_d_266600170_d_543608829!="[]"} & 
#                         Connect_ID!=2824989966 & Connect_ID!=3759939890 & Connect_ID!=4688823720 & Connect_ID!=8589481620 & Connect_ID!=6336258662 & #HFH exclusions
#                           Connect_ID!=4782195164) #UC exclusion

bioqc1 <- bioqc %>%
  filter(
    !is.na(d_646899796_integer) & 
    ( 
      !(Site %in% c("Baylor Scott and White Health", "HealthPartners", "Marshfield Clinical Health System",
                     "Kaiser Permanente Colorado", "Kaiser Permanente Georgia", "Kaiser Permanente Hawaii", "Kaiser Permanente Northwest")) | 
      d_173836415_d_266600170_d_543608829 != "[]"
    ) & 
    Connect_ID != 2824989966 & 
    Connect_ID != 3759939890 & 
    Connect_ID != 4688823720 & 
    Connect_ID != 8589481620 & 
    Connect_ID != 6336258662 & # HFH exclusions
    Connect_ID != 4782195164  # UC exclusion
  )
# 
# bioqc1$str1 <- bioqc1$d_173836415_d_266600170_d_543608829
# 
# bioqc1 %>%  group_by(Connect_ID) %>%  mutate(PolyBloodID = unlist(strsplit(gsub("\\[|\\]", "", str1), ",")) )

str1 <- bioqc1$d_173836415_d_266600170_d_543608829
```

```{r Duplicates, include=FALSE}

dup <- "WITH T AS (
  SELECT Connect_ID 
  FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.biospecimen_JP`
  WHERE d_820476880 LIKE 'CXA%' 
  AND d_820476880 NOT LIKE 'CHA%'
  GROUP BY Connect_ID
  HAVING COUNT(Connect_ID) > 1
) 
SELECT * 
FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.biospecimen_JP`
WHERE Connect_ID IN (SELECT Connect_ID FROM T) and d_820476880 NOT LIKE 'CHA%'"


dup_table <- bq_project_query(project, dup)


dup_data <- bq_table_download(dup_table, bigint = "integer64", n_max = Inf, page_size = 1000)


dup_data$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(dup_data$Connect_ID)


bio_dup= left_join(dup_data, parts_data, by=c("Connect_ID", "d_827220437") )

bio_dup <- bio_dup %>%  mutate(Site=case_when(d_827220437==531629870 ~ "HP",
                                                 d_827220437==548392715 ~ "HF",
                                                 d_827220437==303349821 ~ "Marshfield",
                                                 d_827220437==657167265 ~ "Sanford",

                                                 d_827220437==300267574 ~ "KPHI",

                               Finalized= case_when(d_410912345==104430631 ~ "No",
                                                    d_410912345==353358909 ~ "Yes",
                                                    TRUE ~ "Null"),
                               Setting = case_when(d_650516960== "664882224" ~ "Clinical",

                               SST3_Tube_Collected= case_when(d_376960806_d_593843561==353358909 ~ "Yes",

                               SST4_Tube_Collected= case_when(d_232343615_d_593843561==353358909 ~ "Yes",
                                                              TRUE ~ "No"),
                               SST5_Tube_Collected= case_when(d_589588440_d_593843561==353358909 ~ "Yes",
                                                              TRUE ~ "No"),
                               HeparinT1_Tube_Collected= case_when(d_838567176_d_593843561==353358909 ~ "Yes",
                                                                   TRUE ~ "No"),
                               HeparinT2_Tube_Collected= case_when(d_958646668_d_593843561==353358909 ~ "Yes",

                               EDTAT1_Tube_Collected= case_when(d_454453939_d_593843561==353358909 ~ "Yes",

finalized_counts <- bio_dup %>%
  group_by(Connect_ID) %>%
  summarize(Finalized_Count = sum(Finalized == "Yes"))

#Add the new column indicating if the count is more than 1
finalized_counts <- finalized_counts %>%
  mutate(Finalized_Status = ifelse(Finalized_Count > 1, "Yes", "No"))

# Step 4: Join back with the original data to get the Finalized_Status for all participants

  left_join(finalized_counts %>% select(Connect_ID, Finalized_Status), by = "Connect_ID")
```
